review: I bought my first Fire TV Stick when they were offered to Prime Members.  It has had terrible problems streaming Netflix and Hulu, it pauses and makes a loud noise every so often, but it works for Amazon Prime content, so I continued to use it.  I recently bought a second one for my son, and it worked great for a few weeks, then started causing the TV to flash and/or freeze.  Tried the AppleTV and Tivo in the HDMI port, and no problem, definitely the Fire Stick causing the issue.  It has been a NIGHTMARE trying to get Amazon to replace the defective Stick.  I finally received a new Fire Stick today WITH NO POWER SUPPLY.  I sent back the old power supply when I returned the defective Stick (not entirely sure which part was defective).  E-mailed support, told to live chat, live chat told me I needed to talk to Fire TV support - all to get the replacement power supply they should have sent in the first place.  I'm done with Fire TV.  Bought my son an AppleTV...
